query_1.text: How did Taylor Swift's transition from country to pop music influence her commercial success and critical acclaim in the music industry?

query_2.text: In what ways has Ed Sheeran's songwriting and collaboration with other artists contributed to his status as one of the leading figures in contemporary popular music?

query_3.text: How did Adele Laurie Blue Adkins's vocal style and emotional authenticity shape her career and impact the music industry upon her debut with "19"?

query_4.text: In what ways has Beyoncé Knowles Carter leveraged her platform for social activism while achieving monumental success in her music career?

query_5.text: How has Bruno Mars's incorporation of various musical genres into his work helped him achieve numerous awards and widespread popularity?

query_6.text: In what ways has Lady Gaga's artistic expression and advocacy for mental health awareness influenced her image and the music industry as a whole?
